quote: ASIMO Technical Club has been the cornerstone of technical excellence at GEC Samastipur, providing students with hands-on experience in cutting-edge technologies and fostering innovation.
name: Engineering Excellence

quote: Through workshops, seminars, and technical events, ASIMO bridges the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application, preparing students for real-world engineering challenges.
name: Innovation & Learning

quote: As the flagship technical organization at Government Engineering College Samastipur, ASIMO represents our commitment to multidisciplinary technical education and engineering advancement.
name: Technical Leadership

quote: ASIMO stands for 'Advance Step in MultiTech Orientation,' embodying our mission to create future-ready engineers who excel in multiple technological domains.
name: Future Engineers

quote: Leading the way in robotics, AI, and emerging technologies, ASIMO empowers students to transform ideas into reality through collaborative projects and continuous learning.
name: Tech Innovation
